title: Episode 54: My Friends Mustard
description: This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy is joined by Anna Wolf who runs the Brooklyn-based beer-mustard company “My Friends Mustard”. A self proclaimed beer and food nerd, Anna shares the story of how she started making mustard at home and explains why using beer as ingredient helps her product stand out as something truly delicious and unique. Tune in and learn how mustard can play a role in a date meal, and what the future holds for My Friends Mustard! This episode was sponsored by S. Wallace Edwards & Sons of Surry, Virginia. For more information visit www.surryfarms.com
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
